description: Ms. codex. Title from fol. 1a. Physical description: Written in indifferent naskhi script in black on tan unglazed, laid European paper. Catchwords; headings in large script. In excellent condition. Origin: Text 1 dated 17 Rajab 1342 H. [23 February 1924] (fol. 20b). Following texts likely written around the same time. Incipit (text 1): والحمد لله نحمده ونستعينه ونعوذ به من شرور انفسنا وسيئات اعمالا لا هادي لمن اضل ولا مضل لمن هدى والصلاة والسلام على محمد وعلى وآله وبعد
author: ʻUlufī, Aḥmad ibn Ismāʻīl, -1865 or 1866
abstract: Contains two treatises on Zaydī fiqh and doctrine followed by a number of medicinal recipes.
alternative: Mukhtaṣar al-mufīd fīmā lā yajūzu al-ikhlāl bi-hi li-kull mukallif min al-ʻabīd
extent: ii, 23, ii leaves : paper ; 242 x 180 (175-193 x 122-144) mm. bound to 255 x 188 mm.
title: Kitāb al-Durrah al-muntaẓamah fī fiqh al-aʼimmah al-muʻtaṣamah al-mukhtaṣar min al-Azhār ... [etc.].
uniform_title: درة المنتظمة في فقه الائمة المعتصمة
creator: علفي، احمد بن اسماعيل، -1865 or 1866
subject: Islamic law
